Name: @{weapon_knife}
Description: Watch your back.

Name: @{weapon_hatchet}
Description: Sticks and stones.

Name: @{weapon_switchblade}
Description: A fast-opening knife that can be easily hidden. A must-have for any gangster with self-respect.

Name: @{weapon_battleaxe}
Description: A weapon that splits things in two.

Name: @{weapon_bat}
Description: A solid hardwood bat that breaks skulls.

Name: @{weapon_machete}
Description: Look dangerous.

Name: @{weapon_crowbar}
Description: Break into garages and warehouses.

Name: @{weapon_wrench}
Description: Smash a lot of stuff.

Name: @{weapon_hammer}
Description: Fix stuff or shatter glass, you choose.

Name: @{weapon_knuckle}
Description: A banned weapon that multiplies your fist damage.

Name: @{weapon_nightstick}
Description: A melee weapon for close range combat.

Name: @{weapon_pistol}
Description: A simple and reliable 9mm pistol.

Name: @{weapon_pistol_mk2}
Description: An upgraded version of the 9mm pistol with more customization options. The current ordnance handgun of police departments.

Name: @{weapon_combatpistol}
Description: A small .45 caliber pistol, the best for concealed carry.

Name: @{weapon_heavypistol}
Description: A classic .45 caliber pistol used in past wars and still manufactured today. Great balance between rate of fire and damage.

Name: @{weapon_pistol50}
Description: The heaviest semi-automatic pistol you can get. Low rate of fire but significant damage.

Name: @{weapon_doubleaction}
Description: A double-action revolver, less recoil and reload time than the regular Revolver.

Name: @{weapon_revolver}
Description: A reliable single-action revolver with a 6-round capacity. Very low rate of fire, but massive damage, range and accuracy.

Name: @{weapon_machinepistol}
Description: A full-auto 9mm pistol for the OGs.

Name: @{weapon_appistol}
Description: A powerful and accurate burst-firing 9mm pistol.

Name: @{weapon_ceramicpistol}
Description: A pistol made of ceramic that bypasses metal detectors. Can be used in safe zones.

Name: @{weapon_minismg}
Description: When you need to take care of multiple targets.

Name: @{weapon_microsmg}
Description: Be careful with that trinket.

Name: @{weapon_smg}
Description: The preferred SMG of SWAT teams. Shoots 9mm pistol rounds.

Name: @{weapon_smg_mk2}
Description: A smaller SMG with many customization options.

Name: @{weapon_combatpdw}
Description: A modern PDW chambered for 4.6x30mm ammo with a built-in suppressor.

Name: @{weapon_mg}
Description: A powerful light machine gun.

Name: @{weapon_combatmg}
Description: A combat light machine gun.

Name: @{weapon_gusenberg}
Description: An old fashioned light machine gun.

Name: @{weapon_pumpshotgun}
Description: The #1 choice of bird hunters and home defenders alike.

Name: @{weapon_pumpshotgun_mk2}
Description: Tighter pattern and increased range.

Name: @{weapon_bullpupshotgun}
Description: A very powerful bullpup shotgun loaded with slugs.

Name: @{weapon_combatshotgun}
Description: A powerful automatic combat shotgun.

Name: @{weapon_sawnoffshotgun}
Description: A sawed-off pump-action shotgun. Light and tactical.

Name: @{weapon_dbshotgun}
Description: A powerful sawed-off break-action double-barreled shotgun. Talk about niche.

Name: @{weapon_heavyshotgun}
Description: A powerful semi-automatic shotgun.

Name: @{weapon_boltrifle}
Description: A regular bolt-action rifle with a mounted scope. Perfect for deer hunting.

Name: @{weapon_winchester}
Description: A powerful lever-action rifle with iron sights that offers a good balance between range and damage.

Name: @{weapon_marksmanrifle}
Description: A lightweight tactical semi-automatic rifle.

Name: @{weapon_springfield}
Description: A bolt-action rifle used in two world wars, with the highest damage, an extraordinary range, and decent accuracy.

Name: @{weapon_sniperrifle}
Description: A modern bolt-action rifle with recoil compensation technology. Offers the best range and accuracy, and a good amount of damage.

Name: @{weapon_marksmanrifle_mk2}
Description: An improved version of the original Marksman Rifle with more customization options.

Name: @{weapon_heavysniper}
Description: A powerful .50 caliber sniper rifle.

Name: @{weapon_assaultrifle}
Description: A very reliable soviet-era rifle used in countless conflicts, still popular today.

Name: @{weapon_carbinerifle}
Description: A semi-auto carbine with a good level of accuracy in the medium range.

Name: @{weapon_carbinerifle_mk2}
Description: A tactical full-auto carbine with the best balance between damage and accuracy.

Name: @{weapon_assaultrifle_mk2}
Description: A more accurate version of the original Assault Rifle, with more customization options.

Name: @{weapon_compactrifle}
Description: A shortened Assault Rifle. Same damage, bad accuracy, but more flexibility.

Name: @{weapon_heavyrifle}
Description: A modern assault rifle, military standard around the world.

Name: @{weapon_flaregun}
Description: Useful to announce your position to others.

Name: @{weapon_flashlight}
Description: A light in the dark.

Name: @{weapon_parachute}
Description: Are you afraid of falling?

Name: @{weapon_fireextinguisher}
Description: Put out fire.

Name: @{weapon_petrolcan}
Description: Burn baby, burn.

Name: @{weapon_stungun}
Description: A short-range less-lethal weapon that stuns targets without injuring them. This weapon is provided for free by the police department, if you lost it for some reason, you can get another one here.

Name: @{weapon_snowball}
Description: A snow ball.

Name: @{weapon_grenade}
Description: A frag grenade. Damages nearby targets on explosion.

Name: @{weapon_molotov}
Description: A bottle of gasoline that sets targets on fire on impact. Fire prevents targets from shooting.

Name: @{weapon_smokegrenade}
Description: Releases tear gas which suffocates targets on the long run. Perfect to force your target out of an area.

Name: @{weapon_flashbang}
Description: Blinds and deafens targets within its range. The closer to the explosion, the longer the effects.

Name: @{weapon_dagger}
Description: A very rare antique cavalry dagger.

Name: @{weapon_candycane1}
Description: A giant sweet candy cane.

Name: @{weapon_stocking}
Description: A heavy L-shaped stocking to bless your enemies.

Name: @{weapon_gingerbreadbattleaxe}
Description: A dangerous battle axe made of gingerbread.

Name: @{weapon_battlerifle}
Description: A long range fully automatic battle rifle with the best accuracy and range of its class.

Name: @{weapon_tecpistol}
Description: A compact 9mm SMG that boasts a high rate of fire with a small form factor

Name: Fireworks
Description: A firework launcher with fireworks.
